name: Dragon Diving
description:
The player takes on the role of a skydiver who is using themselves as bait to kill a dragon. As the dragon attacks, they must avoid the attacks while shooting out the dragons vulnerable spots. Can you survive the encounter and make it safely to the ground?

The game should only take about 5 minutes, including time for failures. It also requires a controller.

This is only a prototype. I currently have no plans to adapt it further, but serves as a good starting place, should I decide later to adapt it into a full game.
